title: Attleboro police seek public’s immediate help in search for suspects in house break-ins
content:
ATTLEBORO — Police are urgently seeking assistance from the public in searching for suspects who broke into three houses today on Tiffany Street and Melody Drive.

Two of the break-ins occurred at adjacent houses on Tiffany Street and a third on Melody Drive, Attleboro Police Chief Kyle Heagney said. All three cases were reported within the last hour, starting at about 12:30 p.m., Heagney said, and in each case the front door had been kicked in.
